thread.title: Avjet Adds Gulfstream G550 for Private Jet Charter in Teterboro
thread.title_full: Avjet Adds Gulfstream G550 for Private Jet Charter in Teterboro - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Avjet Adds Gulfstream G550 for Private Jet Charter in Teterboro
text:
Avjet Corporation
BURBANK, Calif., Aug 19, Avjet Corporation, the world's premier charter operator of large cabin, Gulfstream executive aircraft, recently added another G550 for charter; to what is already one of the world's largest fleet of Gulfstream aircraft. This Gulfstream G550, based in Teterboro, New Jersey , solidifies Avjet's global footprint as the industry's leading Gulfstream charter operator. Teterboro Airport is located just 12 miles from downtown Manhattan and is one of the busiest general aviation airports in the United States – housing a large number of private and corporate business jet aircraft.
With Avjet's introduction of another G550 into its charter fleet, it now has further strengthened its "coast to coast" coverage of the United States . "The G550 has proven to be one of our most popular offerings, giving our clientele speed, luxury and sophistication only a Gulfstream product can offer," states Avjet Chairman and CEO Marc Foulkrod . " Teterboro has always been an important exit and entry point in the US and we are very pleased to be able to offer this exquisite G550 for both our local clientele, in and around the New York metro area, as well as for our international clients," Foulkrod continued.
Built with Gulfstream's best-in-class avionics technology, the largest, most luxurious cabin in its class with a forward galley, Wi-Fi, and seating up to 14 passengers with 5 berthable beds – this intercontinental jet, with a 6,750 nautical mile range, can whisk away charter clients in supreme comfort to nearly any destination in the world – from Los Angeles to New York in just over four hours, or fly nonstop from Los Angeles to Paris .
Avjet's current Gulfstream charter fleet around the globe consists of a significant number of Gulfstream large cabin aircraft, including the flagship G650 and G550 model lines as well as the G450, GV, G-IVSP and G-IV aircraft. Additionally, Avjet's charter fleet comprises offerings from Boeing, Bombardier, Hawker and Dassault.
About Avjet Corporation
Avjet Corporation is headquartered in Los Angeles , with additional locations worldwide. Avjet Corporation is the industry leader in Gulfstream luxury air charter. For more information about Avjet's private jet charter services, visit www.avjet.com .
Contact Info: Jessica Rust Avjet Corporation 818-841-6190 jrust@avjet.com
